body:
Hi Abraham, Thank you for your reply and correcting my mistake. I have two issues which I want to discuss with you. A. I tried to create workflow according to your suggestion, but I do not get correct workflow, even I cannot add the second window on the wall(Workflow-1).  B. I tried to use "Honeybee_addHBGlz" to add a door on the wall, the material of door is "Gypsum"(Workflow-2), but I get an error form "Honeybee_ Run Energy Simulation" which are:  1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** FenestrationSurface:Detailed="DOOR_GLZ_0_513C318F179148E79686" has an opaque surface construction; it should have a window construction. 1. The simulation has failed because of this fatal error:
** Fatal ** GetSurfaceData: Errors discovered, program terminates. Please find enclosed file, Could you please help me for these issues. Thanks. Solon.
